overview: Alpinestars presents The Beginning, the first ever all racing, all amateur motocross film.  Experience the amateur nationals to get an exclusive sneak peek on who's hot and see which riders will be dominating the pro ranks in years to come.  From the 50's to the 450's, The Beginning takes you inside the intensity and excitement that you can only find in this core world of amateur motocross.  It's not about the money.  It's not about the fame.....It's about the racing
tagline: The Great Outdoors, just got smaller
title: THE BEGINNING - ALL RACING....ALL AMATEURS
